title: People of Hong Kong, We need our Independence

replies.msg:
When the government is shitting on our faces this obviously and unapologetically,

And that said government is never selected nor authorised by the majority of us Hong Kong people,

And if we really did nothing against it to protect our very own existence and breathing space,

We are quite literally worse than slaves and pigs.

I can't lead, but I will join any uprising for the sake of my and our collective future of Hong Kong, our little wonderful island city.

May the best of our own lead us all out of this common shame, as a nation with shared believes and a unique culture.

#DefendOurHomelandHK
May God watch over us on the waves of Victoria Harbour, the peak of Lion Rocks and the sprawling fields up North

P.S.
IB 42/45
HL 777
IELTS 8.5
CUHK MBChB
IQ 135
British/Canadian Passport Holder

A person with Canada/Sweden Passport inciting Hong Kong people to protest, while he can flee to other countries once shitty stuff happens.

Wow. Once one Banter
